title: Too funny for words
author: VD
content_html:
Amynda does possess a unique ability to completely miss the obvious. I mean, I have to assume that she’s not serious and this post is some sort of joke, since the racially sensitive are going to go absolutely primate-feces should they ever happen to see the cover of her new book.

If she’s serious, then it is nothing less than the exclamation point on the argument that feminism is simply the politics of the white, college-educated left-wing woman.

UPDATE – It seems she’s really just that clueless:

“Good to know what the joy-killing narrative is going to be. My money was on “pornographic”. Shows my guessing skills.”

A commenter adds:

“No wonder black feminists keep telling us we don’t get it…I was really looking forward to the book but I’m having second thoughts now.”
